title: FS: NEW 80 Card Low Grade T206 Lot **FINAL PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: NEW 80 Card Low Grade T206 Lot **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards available for sale or trade. As you can see by the scans, most of these are low grade cards and are priced accordingly. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free. I accept payment via any method you prefer and will gladly consider trades for anything that I need from any other sets. I collect just about everything. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

Abbott - $12
Ames (portrait) wet sheet Sweet Caporal transfer on front - $17
Bates (offset wet SC transfer on front) - $14
Chase (dark cap, throwing) Polar Bear - $20
Geyer - $12
Gray - $17
Hallman - $10
Konetchy (crease across forearm) - $15
Seymour - $13
Strang - $12
Tinker (hands on knees, HOF) - $20
Turner - $14
Weimer - $17

I'll take the following:

Kling SC 150 18
Mcintyre SC 350-460 OP 17
Overall SC 350-460 OP 16
Pfeffer SC 350-460 OP 35
Reulbach Glove Show SC 150 15
Schulte SC 350-460  16
Steinfeldt Port SC 150 17
Tinker Bat On PD 350-460 40
I'll take Ganley and Lobert for asking price

I'd like to purchase:

Chase (White Cap) - $23
McIntyre (Brooklyn) - $20

PM Sent
I've sent an email on the Cravath.
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
One last bump for a final price drop to clear out the rest of these.  Thanks for looking!
